name: obs_jd
description: Observation date and time as Julian Date (JD). Derived from 'DATE_OBS'.

name: ra
description: Right Ascention (degrees) coordinate of where the telescope is pointed. Derived from 'OBJCTRA'.

name: dec
description: Declination (degrees) coordinate of where the telescope is pointed. Derived from 'OBJCTDEC'.

name: filename
description: Absolute path to the corresponding fits file on the Vega data server.

name: IMAGETYP
description: The type of image; e.g. 'Light Frame' | 'Dark Frame' | 'Bias Frame' or 'Flat Frame'.

name: DATE_OBS
description: Datetime string of the moment the observation was taken (in UTC). See 'obs_jd' column for the same time in Julian Days.

name: OBJECT
description: Name of the (intended) object being observed.

name: OBJCTRA
description: Estimated center right ascention coordinate of the image.

name: OBJCTDEC
description: Estimated center declination coordinate of the image.

name: FILTER
description: The name of the filter used in the Observation

name: EXPSTATE
description: Exposure time of the observation (in seconds)

name: EXPOSURE
description: Exposure time of the observation (in seconds)
